name: NSEntityDescription
desc: A description of an entity in Core Data.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The entity name of the receiver.

items.name: var managedObjectModel: NSManagedObjectModel
items.desc: The managed object model with which the receiver is associated.

items.name: var managedObjectClassName: String!
items.desc: The name of the class that represents the receiver’s entity.

items.name: var renamingIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The renaming identifier for the receiver.

items.name: var isAbstract: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver represents an abstract entity.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: The user info dictionary of the receiver.

items.name: var coreSpotlightDisplayNameExpression: NSExpression
items.desc: The expression that computes the CoreSpotlight display name for instances of the entity.

items.name: var subentitiesByName: [String : NSEntityDescription]
items.desc: A dictionary containing the receiver’s sub-entities.

items.name: var subentities: [NSEntityDescription]
items.desc: An array containing the sub-entities of the receiver.

items.name: var superentity: NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: The super-entity of the receiver.

items.name: func isKindOf(entity: NSEntityDescription) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is a sub-entity of another given entity.

items.name: var propertiesByName: [String : NSPropertyDescription]
items.desc: A dictionary containing the properties of the receiver.

items.name: var properties: [NSPropertyDescription]
items.desc: An array containing the properties of the receiver.

items.name: var attributesByName: [String : NSAttributeDescription]
items.desc: The attributes of the receiver in a dictionary.

items.name: var relationshipsByName: [String : NSRelationshipDescription]
items.desc: The relationships of the receiver in a dictionary.

items.name: func relationships(forDestination: NSEntityDescription) -> [NSRelationshipDescription]
items.desc: Returns an array containing the relationships of the receiver where the entity description of the relationship is a given entity.

items.name: class func entity(forEntityName: String, in: NSManagedObjectContext) -> NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: Returns the entity with the specified name from the managed object model associated with the specified managed object context’s persistent store coordinator.

items.name: class func insertNewObject(forEntityName: String, into: NSManagedObjectContext) -> NSManagedObject
items.desc: Creates, configures, and returns an instance of the class for the entity with a given name.

items.name: var versionHash: Data
items.desc: The version hash for the receiver.

items.name: var versionHashModifier: String?
items.desc: The version hash modifier for the receiver.

items.name: var indexes: [NSFetchIndexDescription]
items.desc: An array of fetch index descriptions for the entity.

items.name: var uniquenessConstraints: [[Any]]
items.desc: An array of arrays that contains one or more attributes with a value that must be unique over the instances of that entity.
